thread.title: From Rossy with Love: James Bond film Spectre to be launched with...
thread.title_full: From Rossy with Love: James Bond film Spectre to be launched with...

author: WMNdellis
title: From Rossy with Love: James Bond film Spectre to be launched with...
text:
Comments (0) 
Jonathan Ross is to live out his biggest dream – hosting a James Bond TV special celebrating the release of the spy’s new adventure, Spectre. 
The hour-long special will feature the TV presenter interviewing star Daniel Craig, who reprises his role as the secret agent for the fourth time. 
Bond fan Ross will also interview Craig’s co-stars Naomie Harris (Eve Moneypenny), Andrew Scott (British government member Max Denbigh) and Christoph Waltz (Franz Oberhauser), as well as Bond girls Monica Bellucci (Lucia Sciarra) and Lea Seydoux (psychologist Dr Madeleine Swann). 
The 54-year-old will also get an insight into the classic cars, impressive gadgets, evil villains and beautiful Bond girls of the previous films in the spy franchise, ahead of the 24th film’s release on October 26. 
Ross said: “As a lifelong fan of James Bond, I’m thrilled to be involved with this exclusive behind-the-scenes look at what promises to be 007’s greatest adventure so far.” 
:: James Bond’s Spectre – With Jonathan Ross will air on ITV in the autumn.
